main event: An unidentified flying object fell from the sky, resembling a meteor, and landed about 10 miles southwest of the observer, resulting in a brilliant white ball surrounded by flames.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 10:10 PM on May 22, 1958., The object was reported to have fallen and looked like a meteor., Witnesses observed a brilliant white ball with flames surrounding it., The observation was recorded through multiple military observation methods, including ground-radar and air-visual., There is an indication that there were multiple military channels involved in reporting this sighting.
sighted object: a brilliant white ball surrounded by flames
witness description: Traveling with wife and daughter, observed the object moving quickly in the sky.
